DOC.criteria: General good health determine interview , blood biochemistry profile , complete blood count Antecubital vein amenable blood collection Adverse reaction blood sample collection History anemia excessive bleeding Cigarette smoking , frequent alcohol consumption Use vitamin/mineral supplement Food allergy Lactose intolerance Abnormal thyroid status Chronic disease , lipid malabsorption gastrointestinal disorder Hyper hypolipidemia Body mass index ( BMI ) > 28 History eat disorder restrain eat Current planned pregnancy ; menstrual cycle irregularity abnormality Use hormonal contraceptive ( affect chylomicron clearance ) ; use medication may affect lipid absorption transport
